title: King's Knight's Pawn
description: Now in the iTunes Bookstore: http://bit.ly/QIAhYvFourteen-year-old Christopher witnesses the beheading of Charles the First and flees to Ireland where he becomes involved in the events that lead to the Roundhead Massacre of the Irish and their Cavalier defenders at Drogheda."Christopher Barlow wept when he saw Charles I beheaded and went to Ireland to join the army being rallied under his godfather. author: John Louis Beatty
